label: Nutrition
goals: Eat one serving of fruit with every meal
Make one of your veggie choices green

label: Activity
goals: Take at least a 30 min walk
Do some light physical exercise first thing in the morning
Ride a bike 2-3 times a week
Go to the gym or be physically active at least three times a week

label: Sleep
goals: Get at least 8 hours of sleep
Go to bed and wake up within the same time frame every day
Avoid using devices at least 30 min before bedtime
